check.name: ClassFanOutComplexityCheck
check.description:
Checks the number of other classes a given class relies on. Also the square of this has been shown to indicate the amount of maintenance required in functional programs (on a file basis) at least.

This check processes files in the following way:

property.name: excludedClasses
property.description: Specify userconfigured class names to ignore.

property.name: excludeClassesRegexps
property.description: Specify userconfigured regular expressions to ignore classes.

property.name: excludedPackages
property.description: Specify userconfigured packages to ignore. All excluded packages should end with a period, so it also appends a dot to a package name.
